allMetas.title: Introduction to scroll animations with Intersection Observer
allMetas.description: The Intersection Observer (IO) detects when an element enters or leaves the viewport (or a parent element). It can be used to easily add animation on scroll without external libraries. IO is asynchronous and more efficient than scroll listeners üëç.
